articles.description: I can’t believe Ubisoft canceled The Division Heartland, only to release this mess.
articles.content: XDefiant is Ubisoft’s latest foray into the free-to-play first-person shooter genre. While many hyped the game up as a “Call of Duty Killer” prior to its release, I have been a little more on the cau… [+9416 chars]

articles.title: GPT-4o and Gemini 1.5 Pro: How the New AI Models Compare - CNET
articles.description: Think of them as the Coke and Pepsi of generative AI.
articles.content:
It was a battle of the bots last week as AI startup OpenAI hosted its Spring Update a day before Google's annual I/O developer conference.
